game.name: How Many Secrets Under Ceiling
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The first light novel-style immersive detective game's here! A dentist dead in a double-locked room seems like a suicide, but unexplained contradictions connect different truths. Each investigation and puzzles are up to you. But wait, what's wrong with this suspicious "assistant" following?!
